text: Frank Bernard Brett (born 10 March 1899 – 21 July 1988) was an English footballer who played as a full back. ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1899 births Category:1988 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Tunbridge Wells F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Northampton Town F.C. players Category:Aston Villa F.C. players Category:People from Kings Norton Category:Association football defenders
title: Frank Brett
